overview:
Tim works for Bookbyte (http://www.bookbyte.com) as the Web Production Artist and loves Search Engine Optimization, Social Media Marketing, and other online marketing news/activities. He attended the University of Oregon, where he played lacrosse for the Ducks for two years and studied Information Systems (IS).

Tim used to work for EXIT Real world (http://www.exitrealworld.com) as the IT & web Technician, SEO Analyst, and Online Sales Associate.

Tim enjoys snowboarding, skateboarding, lacrosse, and reading, and is always keeping up on marketing industry news, and new innovative ways to market.
